review:
Dr.Sachin is very good he makes us understand the problem and then suggests the medication.
He guides the patients about the medicine and the side effects if in case we miss the medicine.
Very helpful, patient listener . Prompt advice and prescribed medicines and future course of action. Very satisfied with the meeting
Doctor is approachable. But he is peripheral. If you get to know the indication of the problem, please approach specialist instead of Sachin physician, because anyway he is going to do that.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: * ***** ***** ****** ***** *** ******** ** ** **** ** **** Didn't ask any questions related to health or any pre existing diseases which I have one. Didn't ask what reports readings were. Didn't explain the medicines. **** ****** ******* ******* ************* When consultant back after couple of days. Gave me the list of around 10-12 expensive tests for which I got in doubt again and I consultant another doctor for the same ***** ****** *** **** * ***** **** ** ** ******* ***** **** ***** ******* **** *********** **** *** **** ****** *** ** ** ** ** *** ** ****** **** ** *** ******* Very unsatisfied.
reply_text: Hi..just saw your feedback..if you are so much interested to take steroids without severe symptoms you are most welcome to take according to your second opinion doctor and pathologist. Those test help you to assess the severity. And mind you that is a basic test for this disease. And I really don‚Äôt want patients to be on unnecessary drugs. Anyways get well soon with your second opinion. Very unsatisfied patient that I have ever met.
